usage.cn: 别让一个人为你生气太久，道个歉吧，别让一个人为你负疚太久，宽恕TA吧！
usage.eng: Don't make people mad at you for too long, apologize. Don't make people guilt for too long, forgive.

usage.cn: 道歉并不总是代表我承认自己错了，只能说，我在乎我们的关系，比我自身还在乎
usage.eng: Apologizing does not always mean you are wrong and the other person is right. It just means you value your relationship more than your ego.
